Poem - Boring Bed

Cold ... like the other side of the pillow

    Into the Future

  • Load Model

    ActionController Extension to Automatically Load Model Instances

  • Talking to God

    It should just be easier

Dec 20, 2008
Boring bed
empty spread
One lays down
nothing said

A beast waits long
for their soul to return
Until that time
no fire shall burn
